Burgers.name: Home Sweet Avocado
Burgers.description: All beef patty smothered in sweet lime sauce and topped with fresh avocado, sweet onion, tomato, peppers and stevia. Served on a whole wheat bun.

Burgers.name: Beet-er Late Than Never
Burgers.description: Red beet patty topped with lettuce, relish, tomatoes, pickled beets, and garlic aioli. Served on a whole wheat bun.

Burgers.name: Bohemian Radishy
Burgers.description: All beef patty and swiss cheese slathered in honey dijon mustard sauce topped with pickled radish and yellow pepper relish. Served on a sunflower honey oat roll.

Burgers.name: Don't You Four Cheddar 'Bout Me
Burgers.description: Angus beef patty stuffed with horseradish cheddar and sharp yellow cheddar, topped with mild yellow and sharp white cheddar, crispy bacon, lettuce, and onion. Served on a pretzel bun.

Burgers.name: Baby You Can Chive My Car
Burgers.description: All beef patty stuffed with feta cheese and topped with diced chives and a creamy sour cream & mustard spread. Served on a chive-tastic bun. Comes with fried pickle wheels.

Burgers.name: Mission A-corn-plished
Burgers.description: All beef patty seasoned with a taco blend topped with sweet corn salsa and arugula. Served on a Vienna roll

Burgers.name: Eggers Can't Be Cheesers
Burgers.description: All beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, American cheese, and a fried egg smothered in hot sauce. Served on a maple bun.

Burgers.name: Gourdon Hamsey
Burgers.description: Fried ham patty topped with tomato, lettuce, smoked gouda, and fried squash. Served on a sesame bun.

Burgers.name: If Looks Could Kale
Burgers.description: Impossible burger topped with dairy-free gruyere topped with garlic roasted kale, tomatoes and avocado spread. Served on a whole wheat bun.

Burgers.name: Olive And Let Die
Burgers.description: All beef patty topped with provolone cheese, lettuce, tomato, olive tapenade and garlic aioli crowned with an olive skewer. Served on a whole wheat bun.

Burgers.name: Peas And Thank You
Burgers.description: All beef patty topped with Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, garlic aioli and peas. Served on a sesame bun.

Burgers.name: Hit Me With Your Best Shallot
Burgers.description: All beef patty seasoned with thyme topped with caramelized shallots, lettuce, tomato and smothered in a creamy cherve spread. Served on a french roll.
